Hello!

Nice to meet you.

I love building the web. I'm a problem-solver, an abstract thinker , a power-user, and a team player. I'm always experimenting and learning - and I bring my love for exploration, problem solving, and creation to everything I do. Check out some of my work below, and please get in touch!

designer

Implemented a movie rental application mimicking functionalities of IMDB(Internet Movie Database). Developed the backend of Movies Rental Shop, deployed on Heroku and is built using Express, MongoDB, Fawn, Lodash, etc and unit and integration testing is done using Jest. Technologies: ES6, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDb, Mongoose, JWS Token, Jest, Heroku

full stack designer

Developed the backend of Movies Rental Shop, deployed on Heroku and is built using Express, MongoDB, Fawn, Lodash, etc and unit and integration testing is done using Jest.
